tags.name: zui-icon
tags.description: `<zui-icon>` gives consumers ability to leverage our ZUI defined stickersheet of SVG icons.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: See http://zui.zywave.com/foundations/icons/ page for name of icons, specify a value to choose an icon

attributes.name: no-color
attributes.description: Set to true to revert the default zui-icon-color of a colorized icon to the inherited font color, which is typically zui-gray-800. Has no effect on non-colorized icons.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: See http://zui.zywave.com/foundations/icons/ page for name of icons, specify a value to choose an icon

properties.name: removeIconColor
properties.description: Set to true to revert the default zui-icon-color of a colorized icon to the inherited font color, which is typically zui-gray-800. Has no effect on non-colorized icons.

cssProperties.name: --zui-icon-size
cssProperties.description: To customize size of icon assign a new value to this custom property; note: rem(24) = 24px, also this property applies to both width & height therefore component assumes icon is square aspect ratio
